def nickname_generator(name):
    return "Error: Name too short" if len(name) < 4 else name[:3+(name[2] in "aeiuo")]

def nickname_generator(name):
    return name[:3+(name[2] in 'aeiou')] if len(name) > 3 else 'Error: Name too short'

def nickname_generator(name):
    return "Error: Name too short" if len(name) < 4 else name[:4] if name[2] in "aeiou" else name[:3]

is_vowel = set("aeiou").__contains__

def nickname_generator(name):
    if len(name) < 4: return "Error: Name too short" # Take that Yu, Lee, Bob, and others!
    if is_vowel(name[2]): return name[:4]
    return name[:3]

def nickname_generator(name):
    return (name[:4] if name[2] in "aeiou" else name[:3]) if len(name) > 3 else "Error: Name too short"
